meanings.definition: A removable protective covering for a book.
meanings.sent1: I always make sure to put the dustcover on my favorite book to keep it clean.
meanings.sent2: The library provides a dustcover for each borrowed book to prevent damage.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought the dustcover was a fun toy to play with.
meanings.sent4: Her love for books was so strong that she saw the dustcover as a shield against wear and tear.
meanings.sent5: The colorful dustcover made the book look like a treasure waiting to be discovered.

meanings.definition: To cover with a removable protective covering.
meanings.sent1: She carefully dustcovers her books to ensure they stay in good condition.
meanings.sent2: Before storing the old books, he dustcovers them to shield from dust and dirt.
meanings.sent3: The children decided to dustcover their toys to keep them safe from spills.
meanings.sent4: He dustcovers his laptop every night to protect it from scratches.
meanings.sent5: The gardener dustcovers the delicate plants during the winter to shield them from frost.
